name: DefaultKeyValueTest
description: Unit tests for the DefaultKeyValue class, focusing on its constructors, accessors, mutators, and other functionalities.

methods.name: makeDefaultKeyValue
methods.signature: DefaultKeyValue<K, V> makeDefaultKeyValue(K key, V value)

test_cases.name: testAccessorsAndMutators
test_cases.description: Tests the accessors and mutators of the DefaultKeyValue class.

test_cases.name: testConstructors
test_cases.description: Tests the constructors of the DefaultKeyValue class.

test_cases.name: testEqualsAndHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the equals and hashCode methods of the DefaultKeyValue class.

test_cases.name: testSelfReferenceHandling
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of self-reference in the DefaultKeyValue class to prevent infinite recursion.

test_cases.name: testToMapEntry
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of DefaultKeyValue to a Map.Entry.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the DefaultKeyValue class.
